node.name: Synergy ALM
node.shortdescription:
Synergy ALM (Agile Life-Cycle Management) is an eclipse team plugin that is designed to better serve agile development process and relief developer from process overhead.

The main feature of the software is to automatically correlate Perforce change list with task tracking systems: Bugzilla, Trac, RallyDev etc. bidirectionally

Get trial license for 30 days free usage http://creativepioneer.com/org.yanlin.license.web/trialLicense.jsp
node.body:
Synergy ALM (Agile Life-Cycle Management) is an eclipse team plugin that is designed to better serve agile development process and relief developer from process overhead.

The main feature of the software is to automatically correlate Perforce change list with task tracking systems: Bugzilla, Trac, RallyDev etc. bidirectionally

Get trial license for 30 days free usage http://creativepioneer.com/org.yanlin.license.web/trialLicense.jsp
